attributes.action: Make previous Rent payment history as a basis for mortgage assessment.
attributes.additional_details:
I have been a tenant for the past 10 year of living in the UK and for those 10years have constantly without missing any month paid my rent of £1150 for a two bedroom house yet I cannot afford the deposit for a mortgage as my rent take more than 50% of my rent.

Pratically, over 10year I have paid a total of £138,000 in rent on some bodies mortgage hence been denied the opportunity of owing my own property because of the assessment procedure by the mortgage institution .
This need to be reviewed.
attributes.background: Considering the difficulty and challenges faced but most people in getting on the property ladder , it will be a wise and fair legislation to make mortgage institutions consider previous rent payment history of prospective mortgage applicant than requesting for a 5/10%.
